Since OpenCms version 9.0.1 it is possible to clone modules. This is in particular helpful, if resources of an existing module should be reused in another context. For example, the demo modules shipped with OpenCms might provide content types or formatters that you want to reuse. In such a case, just clone the respective modules and adjust the “clones” to your needs.

To clone a module, click “Module Management” in the “Administration”-view, select the module you want to clone by clicking on the module’s package name, and then click “Clone Module”.
